L

Level - Class in hrw.swenpr.bomberman.common.rfc
Represents a level with its name and size, but no further information of the level.
Level(String) - Constructor for class hrw.swenpr.bomberman.common.rfc.Level
 
Level(String, Point) - Constructor for class hrw.swenpr.bomberman.common.rfc.Level
Deprecated.
The size of the level should not be used anymore. It can be set, but it is often set to NULL.
LEVEL_DIR - Static variable in class hrw.swenpr.bomberman.server.ServerModel
Default location of the level files.
LevelAvailable - Class in hrw.swenpr.bomberman.common.rfc
C <= S LevelAvailable is sent from the server to all clients, when they are logged in (after LoginOk message).
LevelAvailable(ArrayList<Level>) - Constructor for class hrw.swenpr.bomberman.common.rfc.LevelAvailable
 
LevelFile - Class in hrw.swenpr.bomberman.common.rfc
C <= S LevelFile is sent from the server to the clients, when the game starts with GameStart message, so every client can display the level.
LevelFile(File) - Constructor for class hrw.swenpr.bomberman.common.rfc.LevelFile
Creates instance and reads in the given level file.
LevelLoader - Class in hrw.swenpr.bomberman.server
Deprecated.
Should not be used anymore. The ServerModel handles this internally and provides a function, with better performance, for getting all available levels.
LevelLoader() - Constructor for class hrw.swenpr.bomberman.server.LevelLoader
Deprecated.
 
LevelSelection - Class in hrw.swenpr.bomberman.common.rfc
C <=> S LevelSelection is sent from the client of the gamemaster to the server, when he selected a level.
LevelSelection(String) - Constructor for class hrw.swenpr.bomberman.common.rfc.LevelSelection
 
listenSocket() - Method in class hrw.swenpr.bomberman.common.ServerConnection
Waits until a new connection is established, then returns the new socket.
loadLevel(File) - Method in class hrw.swenpr.bomberman.common.BombermanBaseModel
Loads the level from file.
log(LogMessage) - Static method in class hrw.swenpr.bomberman.server.view.MainWindow
Proxy method to add a log message to the JTextArea
Login - Class in hrw.swenpr.bomberman.common.rfc
C => S Login is sent from a client to the server, when he tries to login.

LoginOk - Class in hrw.swenpr.bomberman.common.rfc
C <= S LoginOk is sent from the server to a client, when the login was successful.
